name: Malfunction (itch) (Slimburger)
description:
After a system malfunction your ship can't fly and is constantly shooting. However, the shooting pushes you around, so use this to maneuver around enemies and take them down.

This was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, and it was a tough one since I've been moving house this week, but I managed to make a game, so I'm super happy. It definitely could've turned out better with more balancing and a lot more polish, but I think it's fine all things considered.

I hope you like it :)
